title: kANa virumbum
sahitya:
kANa virumbum manam tAnuvin karuNaiyE kaNNediril uNmai pOl kANum poi poruL uNmai


anupallavi

  Anavam Adi malam vIship-paDarndadAlE arivoLi aNiyumun viLangum mei guruvai


caraNam    ulagil viSaya bhOgam virumbum pulangaL kUDi oru pizhai ariyAda uyirukkanatak-kOTi
 kalaga nOigaLum pala vidha kavalaip-piravit-tunbam kaDu narakuntarumE avaiyaDakki mei inbam
